meanings.definition: A fight between two women that involves scratching, hair-pulling, and other physical aggression.
meanings.sent1: The catfight between the two girls at school was loud and messy.
meanings.sent2: The tabloids were full of stories about the celebrity catfight.
meanings.sent3: During the catfight, they both ended up with torn clothes and messy hair.
meanings.sent4: The catfight in the movie was so intense, it had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The image of the catfight stayed in her mind long after it was over.

meanings.sent1: She decided to catfight back when her friend playfully teased her.
meanings.sent2: The two girls started to catfight over who would get the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly challenged his sister to catfight over the TV remote.
meanings.sent4: The siblings would often catfight for fun, but it never got too serious.
meanings.sent5: In the heat of the argument, they began to catfight playfully.
